section.p: Network Explorer allows you to search through objects using a flexible, user-friendly search syntax.
The key features of Network Explorer are:

ul.li: Saving collections of objects (Collections) or your search query (Saved Searches) with a desired name, in order to view it at a later time.
Using search results in other applications. Some applications can be launched directly from Network Explorer. Other applications can use Network Explorer to search for and return search results.

Each search result, Collection and Saved Search in Network Explorer has a unique URL. This allows it to be bookmarked and shared. Your Collections and Saved Searches will need to be public in order to share with others.
